author: Sarah Mock
title: Crunchy Chickpeas (Air Fryer and Oven Instructions) Ranch Season
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas (16 ounce (drained, rinsed, patted dry))
instructions_list: Using a strainer, rinse and drain the chickpeas. Pat them gently with paper towels and air-dry until completely dry.
Discard any of the outer skins that may fall off.
Spread the chickpeas on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Bake in the oven for 30 minutes, shaking them up halfway through.
Sprinkle the ranch seasoning and grated parmesan cheese. Toss until everything is coated.
Bake for another 5-10 minutes until the chickpeas are crisp. Serve and enjoy!
Using a strainer, rinse and drain the chickpeas. Pat them gently with paper towels and air-dry until completely dry.
Spread the chickpeas on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes, shaking them up halfway through.
Sprinkle the ranch seasoning and grated parmesan cheese. Toss until everything is coated.
Bake for another 5-10 minutes until the chickpeas are crisp. Serve and enjoy!
description: Make these crunchy ranch roasted chickpeas for a savory snack that’s packed with flavor and super easy to prep with pantry staples.
